subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: As a pitcher, Nelson Figueroa Jr. has to mix up the speed of his delivery and vary his release point to stay ahead of hitters. As an artist, he likes to change up images to keep people off guard.
snippet: As a pitcher, Nelson Figueroa Jr. has to mix up the speed of his delivery and vary his release point to stay ahead of hitters. As an artist, he likes to change up images to keep people off guard.
